casebody.data:
Mayor, Etc., of City of New York, Respondent, v. Ehrsam, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. July 6, 1891.) Motion for reargument. Action by the mayor, etc., of the city of New York against William E. Ehrsam. A judgment for plaintiff was affirmed on appeal, and defendant moves for a reargument.

Argued before Allen and Bischoff, JJ.

Jas. Murphy, for appellant. Louis Hanneman, for respondent.

No opinion. Motion for reargument denied, without costs. Eor affirmance of judgment, see 14 N. Y. Supp. 959.
